content: Adds a Coda formula which will return a text string in the doc.
Adds a Coda formula which will return a text string in the doc.
Adds a Coda formula which will return true or false in the doc.
Adds a Coda formula which will return a number in the doc.
Adds a Coda formula which will return an object in the doc.
Adds an action formula which can be used in a button or automation.
Adds a custom column type that you apply to any column in any Coda table.
Adds a everything you need for a card (schema, formula, and column format).
Sets per-user authentication for the Pack.
Sets per-user authentication for the Pack using a bearer token in the Authentication header.
Sets per-user authentication for the Pack, using a Coda API token.
Sets per-user authentication for the Pack, using a token in a custom header.
Sets per-user authentication for the Pack, using multiple tokens passed as HTTP headers.
Sets per-user authentication for the Pack, using a set of custom tokens.
Sets per-user authentication for the Pack, using multiple tokens passed in URL query parameters.
Sets per-user, OAuth2 authentication for the Pack.
Sets per-user authentication for the Pack, using a token passed in a URL query parameter.
Sets per-user authentication for the Pack, using a username and password passed in the Authorization header.
Sets system-wide authentication for the Pack.
Sets system-wide authentication for the Pack using a bearer token in the Authentication header.
Sets system-wide authentication for the Pack, using a token in a custom header.
Sets system-wide authentication for the Pack, using a set of custom tokens.
Sets system-wide authentication for the Pack, using multiple tokens passed in URL query parameters.
Sets system-wide authentication for the Pack, using a token passed in a URL query parameter.
Sets system-wide authentication for the Pack, using a username and password passed in the Authorization header.
Allows the pack to make requests to listed domains.
code: pack.addNetworkDomain("${1:example.com}");
